# incremnet

an 88x31 that you can click  
![](https://i.vgy.me/w355Od.png)

*visit [increm.net](https://increm.net) to get your own!* <sup>or just read below</sup>

## using

place this `iframe` somewhere you would normally put an 88x31. don't forget to change the `key`!

```html
<iframe
  src="http://localhost:1337/badge?key=my_key"
  title="incremnet badge"
  width="88"
  height="31"
  style="border: none; background: url('data:image/png;base64,');"
></iframe>
```
